definition: to cooperate/to harmonize/to help/to assist/to join

sentences.english: All these facilities help society reduce the generation gap between the elderly and the others.
sentences.chinese: 这可以协助缩小老人和其他人之间的代沟。

sentences.english: An easy to use collaborative environment for editing and running features. There is already RubyMine and LowDown, but I have some different ideas myself.
sentences.chinese: 提供易于使用的协助环境来编辑和运行相关功能。

sentences.english: The economic development that the bank helped spur has unleashed a wave of environmental woes.
sentences.chinese: 亚银协助亚洲经济快速发展，引爆一波环保灾难。

sentences.english: And these various feedback mechanisms quickly facilitate jumpstarting the necessary people into action.
sentences.chinese: 这些反馈机制能够及时协助有关人员迅速采取行动。

sentences.english: Broken glass and pipettes are "sharps". Dispose of them correctly too.
sentences.chinese: 弃置大件玻璃利器时，请通知当值职员协助妥善处理。

sentences.english: Max enlisted the help of his neighbors to find his missing dog.
sentences.chinese: 麦斯寻求邻居协助他寻找失踪的狗儿。

sentences.english: A Soviet naval base near Murmansk helped the Nazi attack on Norway.
sentences.chinese: 苏联摩尔曼斯克一处海军基地协助纳粹攻击挪威。

sentences.english: The gall bladder stores and discharges the bile, which helps to break down fats into minute droplets.
sentences.chinese: 胆囊储存和释放胆汁，协助脂肪分解为微小的颗粒。

sentences.english: The clerk assisted the judge by looking up related precedents.
sentences.chinese: 这位书记官协助那位法官查阅有关判例。

sentences.english: The farthest Francis and I have gotten is world 7 with some help from his mom.
sentences.chinese: 佛朗西斯和我在他妈妈的协助下最高玩到七级世界。

sentences.english: Support to set up and maintain MXM Export Compliance system.
sentences.chinese: 协助建立和维护美捷特厦门出口控制系统。

sentences.english: The office in BeiJing will offer the help according to the condition.
sentences.chinese: 北京市外办将酌情协助安排。

sentences.english: When 6. free times the assistance warehouse tube processes the warehouse thing.
sentences.chinese: 空闲时协助仓管员处理仓库事物。

sentences.english: She was assisted in the management of her vast property by her son-in-law Mathur Mohan.
sentences.chinese: 她被女婿马图尔巴乌任命去协助管理巨大的财富。

sentences.english: When Ed finds out, Sam agrees to help the FBI capture several key members of the cartel.
sentences.chinese: 艾德发现，曼霞协助警方追查组织的几位头号人物。

sentences.english: Kondo, who have ably assisted me for the continue tgoy ages, and have be connected with the firm from the date of its establishment.
sentences.chinese: 该员自自己搞成立二十年来，一直在协助一自己任务。

definition: to join forces/to give full cooperation
to supervise and urge completion of a task/to urge on
so that/so as to/in order to
to be in charge of/to take responsibility for/to be to blame/conscientious
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
to get in touch with/to contact/to stay in contact (with)/liaison/(math.) connection
